HotelElement.Name: Four Points by Sheraton Hainan Sanya

Description.Text: Four Points by Sheraton Hainan Sanya is a modern 5-star hotel offering stylish accommodation near the heart of Sanya. It boasts excellent leisure and wellness facilities, onsite dining and a beachfront location. Sanya Bay is situated on the southern tip of Hainan offering beautiful tropical beaches and clear blue seas. The local area boasts a high number of golf courses and there are also plenty of restaurants, bars and nightlife hotspots. Regional places of interest include the picturesque Tianya Haijiao, Yalong Bay and the Seven Fairy Hot Spring. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Sanya destinations. The hotel occupies a high-rise building featuring contemporary architecture. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool, a gym, tennis court and a spa complex offering a range of massage and wellness treatments. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Comfort rooms are decorated in a modern style. They are located on floors 7-29 and feature a private balcony offering impressive city views. Amenities include a 42-inch flat-screen TV, an iPod dock, tea and coffee equipment, complimentary bottled water, chargeable Wi-Fi, a safe and work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub and separate walk-in shower. The Eatery serves fresh Western-inspired dishes, while China Spice offers fine local and Cantonese specialities. Japanese cuisine is served in an intimate and welcoming ambience at Saila. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks and sea views at the Lounge. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel provides 24-hour reception, concierge and room service.
